artist: Artist: Howard Hodgkin; Printer: Solo Press, New York; Publisher: Bernard Jacobson Ltd.
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: two sheets of different sizes mounted together; greys and black on white; floating head and shoulders of man at left, in front of grey ground with white arcs, circles and zigzags; grey arrow at center, pointing down; black rectangle at right
dimension:
44 x 55 1/2 in. (111.76 x 140.97 cm) (sheets, overall)
50 x 61 1/4 in. (127 x 155.58 cm) (outer frame)
medium: Lithograph in beige and black with hand-coloring; diptych
provenance: Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2002.
title: Black Moonlight
